items.name: static var drawsBeforeStartLocation: CGGradientDrawingOptions
items.desc: The fill should extend beyond the starting location. The color that extends beyond the starting point is the solid color defined by the CGGradient object to be at location 0.

items.name: static var drawsAfterEndLocation: CGGradientDrawingOptions
items.desc: The fill should extend beyond the ending location. The color that extends beyond the ending point is the solid color defined by the CGGradient object to be at location 1.
